name: Ribeye
steps: Leave Steak out at room temperature for 10 minutes
Wait 40 minutes (in addition to the 10 you just waited in the last iteration above)
Pour Olive Oil into a dark pan until there is ~3mm of Oil in the pan
Heat the pan on on medium-high
Once the oil is hot, place the steak in on one side for 7 minutes
Flip the Steak to the other side for 6 minutes
Put the Steak on a warm plate
Put the Finishing Butter on the Steak
Let teh Steak rest for 10 minutes to retain juice, then dig in
comments: This is Jake's favorite thing to eat
